:::Hurricane/Hellbat/Wheeljack:::

::Hurricane reaches the Iron Fist, dodging the batle that seemed to be going 
on and ran inside.  He put Hellbat in a CR chamber, and then carried 
Treadshot's parts out back to dump off::
Wheeljack: Dont!
Hurricane: Ahh!
::He turns around and sees Wheeljack::
Hurricane: Whaddaya mean, dont, hes dead!
Wheeljack: His mind may be salvagable, and if so, i can rebuild him.
Hurricane: Fine.
::They walk into Wheeljack's lab and get to work on rebuilding Treadshot::

--part1_b3.61b9a91.279ee53f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
